think_procedure: The description of the knob 'vacuum_cost_page_dirty' does not mention any special values that would change the function of the knob. It seems to be a regular numerical knob where the value represents the cost charged when vacuum modifies a block that was previously clean. The default value is 20, but there is no mention of any special values like -1 or 0 that would disable a feature or change the function of the knob.
